DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety fix-dose combination therapy Gemigliptin 50mg Rosuvastatin 20mg type 2 diabetes dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Dyslipidemia Adults least 19 year old Patients type 1 diabetes , diabetic ketoacidosis , diabetic coma precoma Patients gestational diabetes secondary diabetes Patients NYHA Class III , IV congestive heart failure arrhythmia require treatment Patients thyroid gland dysfunction deviate normal TSH range Patients pituitary insufficiency adrenal insufficiency
